About RepTate

Quick search

RepTate documentation¶

RepTate (Rheology of Entangled Polymers: Toolkit for Analysis of Theory & Experiment) is a free and open source software package for viewing, exchanging and analysing experimental data.

Contents:

  • About RepTate
  • Features
  • Installation
  • User Manual
  • RepTate for developers
  • Version History

More info on:

  • http://blogs.upm.es/compsoftmatter/software/reptate/

  • https://github.com/jorge-ramirez-upm/RepTate

Authors:

  • Jorge Ramirez (jorge.ramirez@upm.es)

  • Victor Boudara (v.a.boudara@leeds.ac.uk)
